item.title: Kizi monster island game
item.description: A fun logic game in which you have to shoot different types of projectiles and blow up monsters. They hide behind all sorts of obstacles and do not want to explode. Use the mouse to choose the direction and strength of the shot, trying to hit each target accurately. Use barrier walls, ceilings and other objects to ricochet. This is the only way to get rid of the enemies.
